=========
close_tab
=========

.. js:function:: close_tab(container, tab_id)

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Task </refs/client/task_api>`

Description
===========

Use the ``close_tab`` method to close tab in the ``container`` identified by 
``tab_id``.

See also
========

:doc:`init_tabs <m_init_tabs>`

:doc:`add_tab <m_add_tab>`
